pkgmetadata.longdescription: Odoo Python Client===============================![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/odoo-client?style=flat-square) Odoo API Client in Python- Free Software: MIT License### Installation```shpip install odoo_client```### Quickstart```pythonfrom odoo_client import OdooClientODOO_URL = "<Your Odoo URL>"ODOO_DB = "<Your Odoo Database Name>"ODOO_USER = "<Your Odoo Username>"ODOO_PW = "<Your Odoo Password>"CLIENT = OdooClient(ODOO_URL, ODOO_DB, ODOO_USER, ODOO_PW)PARTNER = CLIENT.object("res.partner")# Search for Partners that are companies and return the fields: "name", "country_id" and "comment"records = PARTNER.search_read([["is_company", "=", True]], ["name", "country_id", "comment"])```
